mapper.sql: id, uptime, terminal_id, carno, lon, lat, speed, direction, height, mile, oil, `status`, alarmflag, acc, `position`, lon_gcj02, lat_gcj02, savetime, airtight, load, lift
mapper.select: select * from ${tableName} where terminal_id= #{terminalId} and savetime <= STR_TO_DATE(#{eTime},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') and savetime > STR_TO_DATE(#{sTime},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') and speed>0 ORDER BY savetime ASC;
mapper.insert: insert into t_history_position (id, uptime, terminal_id, carno, lon, lat, speed, direction, height, mile, oil, `status`, alarmflag, acc, `position`, lon_gcj02, lat_gcj02, savetime,airtight, load, lift) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{uptime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{terminalId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{carno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lon,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{lat,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{speed,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{direction,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{height,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{mile,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{oil,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{alarmflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{acc,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{position,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{lonGcj02,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{latGcj02,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{savetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{airtight,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{load,jdbcType=TINYINT},#{lift,jdbcType=TINYINT})

id,
uptime,
terminal_id,
carno,
lon,
lat,
speed,
direction,
height,
mile,
oil,
`status`,
alarmflag,
acc,
`position`,
lon_gcj02,
lat_gcj02,
savetime,
airtight,
load,
lift

mapper.update:
update t_history_position
terminal_id = #{terminalId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
carno = #{carno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
lon = #{lon,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
lat = #{lat,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
speed = #{speed,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
direction = #{direction,jdbcType=INTEGER},
height = #{height,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
mile = #{mile,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
oil = #{oil,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
`status` = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
alarmflag = #{alarmflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
acc = #{acc,jdbcType=TINYINT},
`position` = #{position,jdbcType=TINYINT},
lon_gcj02 = #{lonGcj02,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
lat_gcj02 = #{latGcj02,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
savetime = #{savetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
airtight = #{airtight,jdbcType=TINYINT},
load = #{load,jdbcType=TINYINT},
lift = #{lift ,jdbcType=TINYINT}
where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and uptime = #{uptime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT terminal_id) as all_online FROM ${tableName}

SELECT a.terminal_id, a.uptime, c.car_no FROM (SELECT t.terminal_id, MAX(t.uptime) uptime FROM ${tableName} t WHERE (t.lat - #{centerLat,jdbcType=DECIMAL}) * (t.lat - #{centerLat,jdbcType=DECIMAL}) + (t.lon - #{centerLong,jdbcType=DECIMAL}) * (t.lon - #{centerLong,jdbcType=DECIMAL}) <= #{semidiameter, jdbcType=DECIMAL} * #{semidiameter, jdbcType=DECIMAL} AND t.uptime >= #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} AND t.uptime <= #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} GROUP BY t.terminal_id ) a LEFT JOIN car_info c ON a.terminal_id = c.terminal_id Order By uptime DESC

SELECT a.terminal_id, a.uptime, IFNULL(r.carno, c.car_no) car_no FROM (SELECT t.terminal_id, MAX(t.uptime) uptime from ${tableName} t where MBRContains( ST_GeomFromText(CONCAT('POLYGON((', #{polygon, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '))')), ST_GeomFromText(CONCAT('POINT(', lon, ' ', lat, ')')) ) > 0 AND t.uptime >= #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} AND t.uptime <= #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} GROUP BY t.terminal_id) a LEFT JOIN car_info c ON a.terminal_id = c.terminal_id LEFT JOIN t_realtime_position r ON a.terminal_id = r.terminal_id Order By uptime DESC
